title: madhvarAyara nenedu
sahitya:
madhvarAyara nenendu suttarAgirO hoddi vaiSNava mata bhavAbdhidATirO


caraNam 1    udayadalli EluvAga mudadi snAna mADuvAga odagi nitya karmagaLanu naDesuvAga 
hrdayadalI bIjAkSara mantragaLanu japisuvAga sadamalAnanda hanumanannu neneyirO
    caraNam 2   kAmavillada hariya pUje vaishvadEva mADuvAga prEmadinda vaiSNavara arcisuvAga 
A mahA pakSya bhOjya ArOgana mADuvAga nEmadinda kauravAntaka bhImasEnana neneyirO
    caraNam 3    karagaLannu toLedu tIrtta tuLasIdaLa vIyuvAga pari pariya bala puSpa vILya arpisuvAga
sarvAntaryAmi guru madhvarantarAtmaka purandara viTTalage samarpaNa mADirO
